pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Obsidian$(li)Crying Obsidian$(li)Blackstone$(li)Gilded Blackstone$(li)Magma Block$(li)Ice Block$(li)Coal Ore

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[275, 80, 80, 5, 65, 25]
This gem can be injected with a tier 2 injector setup.
